name: Nofollow Tags For Movies Sites
author: Jeff Standerson

sections.description:
Nofollow Tags For Movies Sites adds the nofollow tag to all of your outgoing links to video hosting websites. Perfect if you’re running a Video / Movies / Tv / Anime blog.

Below is the primary list of sites written in to the plugin that will have the nofollow tag already attached.

4shared.com
56.com
beta.miloyski.com
bigupload.com
blinkx.com
blip.tv
bolt.com
boltfolio.com
clipshack.com
cruncyroll.com
dailymotion.com
divxden.com
divxstage.net
divxvine.com
filebase.to
freestreamtube.com
gougou.com
graboid.com
infinitemb.com
ku6.cn
megashare.com
megashares.com
megaupload.com
megavideo.com
metacafe.com
motionbox.com
movshare.net
myspace.com
mystream.to
novamov.com
ouou.com
rapidshare.com
revver.com
stagevu.com
supernovatube.com
stream2k.com
streamleech.com
themoviedownloads.com
todou.com
truveo.com
veoh.com
upzilla.net
vhead.blog.sina.com.cn
video44.com
videoegg.com
vimeo.com
wartog.info
wisevid.com
xtshare.com
youko.com
youtube.com
zangocash.com
zhare.net
sections.installation:
1. Upload Nofollow Tags For Movies Sites to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it! Sit back and relax!
sections.faq:
Q. Why do I need this plugin?
A. This will help stop competing large video hosts rank higher in the search engine results than you. You are already sending them direct traffic, you don’t want to give them 1000’s of one way links also. Do they send you any traffic??? NO!

Q. Some of the video hosts that I link to are not in the list, can they still be added?
A. We’ve built the Nofollow Tags For Movies Sites plugin with this in mind. If we haven’t added your desired video host to the list of sites that require a nofollow tag (which, by the way, is very unlikely, see above for full list), you can simply login to the plugin editor and add it yourself!
